title: #301: The Hunt for a Serial Killer, Rapist, Paedophile, Burglar - Part 6
description:
We resume our coverage of serial perpetrator RR. Jim and Laura analyze the murder of William Doi, the rape and torture of Lillian Doi, as well as the murders of Mabel Bell and her sister Nettie Lang. We also discuss the horrific attack and rape of Carol Kyle who was at home with her 11 year old son Mark when RR broke into their house in the early hours of May 30, 1985. 


PLEASE SIGN LAURA’S PETITION TO STOP SERIAL PERPETRATORS AND STALKERS ABUSING MULTIPLE WOMEN!!!

https://www.change.org/p/boris-johnson-prime-minister-stop-serial-perpetrators-and-stalkers-abusing-multiple-women
